sense.gloss: while (e.g. one is young), during, within (e.g. a day), in the course of
in (secret, chaos, poverty, etc.), amidst, with (e.g. success)
within oneself, one's feelings, inner thoughts
my spouse, my husband, my wife
signed on behalf of (husband's name) by his wife
one's house, one's home, one's family, one's household
one's house, one's home, one's family
fervent enthusiast, nut, person singularly obsessed with something

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑芸術↑↓げいじゅつ↓↑家↑↓か↓ではない。↑全然↑↓ぜんぜん↓↑向↑↓む↓いていない。
sdata.e: I am not an artist. I never had the knack for it.
Why don't you come visit us?

sdata.j: ↑家↑↓いえ↓に↑帰↑↓かえ↓りましょうか。
こわれやすいガラス↑張↑↓ば↓りの↑家↑↓いえ↓に↑住↑↓す↓む↑者↑↓もの↓は↑石↑↓いし↓を↑投↑↓な↓げてはいけない。
sdata.e: Those who live in glass houses should not throw stones.

sdata.j: ガラスの↑家↑↓いえ↓に↑住↑↓す↓む↑人↑↓ひと↓は↑石↑↓いし↓を↑投↑↓な↓げるべきではない。
sdata.e: Those who live in glass houses should not throw stones.

sdata.j: ↑最後↑↓さいご↓に↑家族↑↓かぞく↓でディズニーランドへに↑行↑↓い↓ってからもう↑随分↑↓ずいぶん↓になる。
sdata.e: It has been so long since I last went to Disneyland with my family.

sdata.j: ↑友達↑↓ともだち↓はいつも↑僕↑↓ぼく↓のこととても↑落↑↓お↓ち↑着↑↓つ↓いてるって↑言↑↓い↓うけれど、↑家族↑↓かぞく↓にはいつもいらいらしているって↑言↑↓い↓われるんだ。
sdata.e: My friends always say I'm too calm, but my family always says I'm too annoying.

sdata.j: ↑仏↑↓ふつ↓↑政府↑↓せいふ↓は↑国家↑↓こっか↓↑予算↑↓よさん↓の↑帳尻↑↓ちょうじり↓を↑合↑↓あ↓わせるよう↑納税↑↓のうぜい↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓に↑挑↑↓いど↓むオンラインゲームを↑売↑↓う↓り↑出↑↓だ↓した。
sdata.e: The French government has launched an online game that challenges taxpayers to balance the national budget.

sdata.j: ああ！　もし↑私↑↓わたし↓がお↑金持↑↓かねも↓ちだったら、スペインに↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑家↑↓いえ↓を↑買↑↓か↓ったのに。
sdata.e: Ah! If I were rich, I'd buy myself a house in Spain.

sdata.j: ああ！ もし↑私↑↓わたし↓がお↑金持↑↓かねも↓ちだったら、スペインに↑家↑↓いえ↓を↑買↑↓か↓うのに。
sdata.e: Ah! If I were rich, I'd buy myself a house in Spain.
